Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I get apps from the Amazon app store from an unsupported region?  I followed a tutorial that would allow me to access the amazon android app store.  When I filled everything out, (account, address, one-click, etc.) it still won't allow me to download, saying that it isn't in my region.I used this tutorial.  What's the problem?
Title: Amazon Android App Store International

history.Text: I followed a tutorial that would allow me to access the amazon android app store.  When I filled everything out, (account, address, one-click, etc.) it still won't allow me to download, saying that it isn't in my region.I used this [tutorial][1].  What's the problem?  [1]: http://abtevrythng.blogspot.com/2011/03/how-to-use-amazon-app-store-outside-us.html

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [How can I get apps from the Amazon app store from an unsupported region?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7254/how-can-i-get-apps-from-the-amazon-app-store-from-an-unsupported-region)  I followed a tutorial that would allow me to access the amazon android app store.  When I filled everything out, (account, address, one-click, etc.) it still won't allow me to download, saying that it isn't in my region.I used this [tutorial][1].  What's the problem?  [1]: http://abtevrythng.blogspot.com/2011/03/how-to-use-amazon-app-store-outside-us.html
